snippet: Tenet, the early-music group, presented François Cuperin’s lessons for Lent at the Church of the Blessed Sacrament.
abstract: Vivien Schweitzer reviews concert of French Baroque works performed by the early-music ensemble Tenet at the Church of the Blessed Sacrament.
lead_paragraph: Tenet, the early-music group, presented François Cuperin’s lessons for Lent at the Church of the Blessed Sacrament.

headline.seo: Tenet Performs Couperin’s Lessons for Lent
headline.main: French Baroque Rays of Light Pierce Lenten Shadows
headline.print_headline: French Baroque Rays of Light Pierce Lenten Shadows
